  • Class
    Description
    CommonBoard
    CommonBoard handles the component piles durning the building phase of the game.
    iCards
    Represents a pile of iCard that can be pulled.
    iCommonBoard
    Interface representing the center board during the construction phase.
    iPlanche
    The planche class handles the movement of the player on the board.
    LevelTwoCards
    A pile of iCard containing both level one and two cards, and a set of cards available to see during the construction phase.
    Planche
    The planche class handles the movement of the player on the board.
    TestFlightCards
    A pile of iCard containing only eight specific level one cards, and no cards available to see during the construction phase.
